item.title: deer in the headlights
item.description: My sister joins college this year, with absolutely no development experience. And as she starts working on small projects, in technologies she’s never used before, there are times I see her being blocked by a seemingly impenetrable coding problem. And more often than not, ‘how to proceed from here’ is often rendered as a huge question mark across her face. All.software.has.defects. Given enough time, anything that can go wrong, will go wrong.

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Arathi! I like building stuff - and Iâ€™m lucky that I get to do it as my job. I currently work as a fullstack developer at Goldman Sachs helping in compliant reporting using (mostly) Java and React. Over the course of my 2 year professional stint, I’ve developed an interest in distributed systems - their workings, reliability, scalability - after all, it is the peripherals that matter. Apart from this, I enjoy swimming, reading, trekking, marathons and sudoku.
